llm_topic_proposal_raw.motivation: The article highlights the significant impact of ultra-processed foods on health outcomes, particularly their link to rising colon cancer rates, necessitating a new atomic node to analyze dietary influences on macro health trends.
llm_topic_proposal_raw.name: Ultra-Processed Foods

topic_category.motivation: Macro-level dietary factor influencing health outcomes and disease incidence

relevance_gate.reason: Ultra-Processed Foods is an industry vertical/product category, not a macro driver or tradable asset; it does not directly inform trading decisions.
